title: fcip-a220-01-02.pdf.docx
text: Project Title: Project Supervisor: PROJECT CONTRACT ● We can share our thoughts and feelings whenever we want, but we do not force our friends to do so. ● We listen to each other. ● We do not judge one another for our opinions. ● We may have different characteristics, but here we are all equal. ● We show respect to each other. ● Everyone participates equally in all activities and tasks. ● The personal ideas shared in this group remain within the group. ● Everyone arrives at project meetings on time, and we agree that if we are more than 5 minutes late, we will be marked as absent. ● We will pay attention to the service (transportation) hours. ● We will comply with the rules of the institution we visit. ● We will complete the necessary preparations for the planned activities on time. ● We will adhere to the task distribution among us. ● We will not share any confidential information about the institution we visit with third parties outside the project.
